title: Can't view deployment data of vRealize and Oracle products
content:
In SAM, you can't view the deployment information of VMware vRealize Operations and Oracle products.

Cause

For running instances, the version information may come from either the application version description or the version property in UD/UCMDB. However, in the live deployment condition, SAM retrieves the version data only from the application version description property.

Workaround

To fix the issue for Oracle products, apply the 2022.05.P1 patch.

For VMware vRealize Operations, you can use the following workaround to get its deployment data:
In CMS, search for the "VMware vRealize Operations" running software and make sure that the application version description property has a value. If not, copy the value from the version property and assign it to the application version description property.
